revised_title: On the Velocity Distribution Function and Stresses in Non-Uniform Rarefied Monatomic Gases
tldr: The authors extend the solution of the velocity distribution function to gases where the mean free path of a molecule is not small compared to the scale of length in which the gas's properties vary. They develop a new equation of transfer and provide a solution of the distribution function to any desired degree of completeness, which can be applied to various molecular models.
